name: Fowl Goods
description:
CONTROLS WASD/Arrow Keys to move SPACE to jump E to pickup or interact

PRESS E AT THE WINDOW TO START YOUR DAY!

DESCRIPTION You play as a chicken pawning off anything he can find in order to save his chicken brothers! The customers are picky though, you can’t just give them anything! Pay attention to what they ask for… How many eggs can you get in 5 days? What kind of ending will you get?

Font used was not made by us, we got it from Eeve Somepx
